body:
Okay i did so. I got the following errors,

	```
fail("%sPython Configuration Error:%s...))
Python Configuration Error: 'PYTHON_BIN_PATH' environment variable is not set
 and referenced by '//third_party/py/numpy:headers'.
ERROR: Analysis of target '//tensorflow/python/tools:strip_unused' failed; build aborted.
```
